QuestData.Title: Good News... and Bad News
QuestData.Description: <Blackhorn used the power of Thol'embaar's remains to slip his bonds. But at least the inferno seems to be subsiding.>$B$B<Matoclaw will want to know what happened here. She's waiting for you back at the Grove of Aessina.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Talk to Matoclaw at the Grove of Aessina in Mount Hyjal.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Talk to Matoclaw at the Grove of Aessina in Mount Hyjal.
QuestData.RewardText: What? Blackhorn helped you combat the inferno but escaped in the process? That crafty weasel!$B$BIt's not your fault, $n. He'd probably been plotting this the moment he saw the flames begin creeping up the mountain. We'll have to deal with him later.
